resources.string: The account is disabled. Unable to access the service server.
Connect to FlashAir manually from Settings
Do you want to continue recording?
This dictation name already exist in the list
Please wait while compress your recording or press the home button to compress in the background
Do you want to continue insertion?
Do you want to continue overwrite?
Cannot record anymore since it reached maximum recording.
Since recording file size is large, it will be sent seperating to several files.
Please disconnect the active call and proceed
There is not enough memory or disk space to complete the operation
Since selected file size exceeds email attachment limit, it will be sent as multiple emails.
FlashAir™ is a trademark or registered trademark of TOSHIBA CORPORATION.
Please activate your account.Tap the [Check Server Connection] to activate in the Server Options.
Cannot establish connection with FlashAir card
An error occured while receving the data. please check the FlashAir connection
Cannot send the following file(s) since file size is too large .Please use \'FTP\' option to send large files.
Please switch back to valid Wi-fi connection if you are connected to the FlashAir card
Wi-Fi is not accessible.Please make sure that Wi-Fi is enabled in the settings.
FlashAir connection is required for this function.Connect to FlashAir card using Settings>Wi-Fi>Choose a network
Establish a Wi-Fi Connection with FlashAir card and Tap "Done"
Set this FlashAir card in Settings
Sending dictation file(s). Do not press Home/Sleep button until the transmission is completed.
Your profile is being used by another device. Select [Yes] to use your profile to activate this device.\nNOTE: The other device will be deactivated once you select [Yes].
This device is deactivated by administrator.Tap the [Check Server Connection] to activate in the Server options.
This device is already activated by another E-mail address. Do you want to change the E-mail address?
Can\'t connect to server.The ODP connection failed.
Activation failed due to incorrect Author ID or Recipients entries.
The license expired. Unable to access the service server.
The version of the app is old. Unable to access the service server. Update the app.
Activation failed due to a shortage of available licenses. Please order an additional license.
Select the \"Sending Failed\" items in the Outbox tab and tap the [Send] icon to resend them.
Please enter a valid dictation name.
You haven\'t saved your changes.Click Discard below to proceed without saving or Cancel to return to recording.
Are you sure you want to delete # recordings in Pending? This cannot be undone.
Are you sure you want to delete all recordings in Pending? This cannot be undone and you will lose all recordings in Pending.
What do you want to do for sent dictation?
This service sends dictation files via E-mail and FTP. For prevent information leakage,we recommend you to make demands your administrator to encrypt dictation files strongly.
Are you sure you want to send all recordings?
Are you sure you want to send # recordings?
You have changed server information. Do you want to authenticate with server?
Connection to the server failed. Please make sure Server URL, User, Password and E-mail are correct.
Please restart application for language settings to take effect
The ODP connection failed.Please enter a valid ODP URL.
This worktype already exists in the list
FlashAir is a trademark or registered trademark of TOSHIBA CORPORATION
Unable to start recording. Another recorder application running
Wi-Fi is a registered mark of the Wi-Fi Alliance.
Enter new recipient\'s E-mail address, tap the (+) icon to add. Please select this user from the Recipients list, to send dictations to this user.
E-mail not available for selected person
Author\'s e-mail address and Author ID (Initials)

Privacy Policy for Olympus Dictation for Android of Olympus Corporation

1. Using Permissions

(1) RECORD_AUDIO

This is used for the recording function in the App.

(2) READ_PHONE_STATE

By reading this state will detect incoming and outgoing calls that occured during recording and stop the App to record.

(3) READ_CONTACTS

This is being used to select the destination of the e-mails attached with voice files.
This worktype already exists in the list
